where.if: AND (UPPER(qstn) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{searchValue}),'%') OR UPPER(answ) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{searchValue}),'%'))

mapper.sql: ORDER BY cl_code ASC, qstn ASC
mapper.select: SELECT faq.faq_id, faq.cl_code, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM T_CODE WHERE GROUP_ID = 'FAQ_CAT' AND CODE_ID = faq.cl_code) AS faq_cate_nm, faq.qstn, faq.answ, faq.ord_seq, faq.file_id, faq.use_yn, faq.rgst_id, faq.rgst_dt, faq.modi_id, faq.modi_dt, faq.view_cnt FROM t_bbs_faq faq

SELECT faq.faq_id, faq.cl_code, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM T_CODE WHERE GROUP_ID = 'FAQ_CAT' AND CODE_ID = faq.cl_code) AS faq_cate_nm, faq.qstn, faq.answ, faq.ord_seq, faq.file_id, faq.use_yn, faq.rgst_id, faq.rgst_dt, faq.modi_id, faq.modi_dt, faq.view_cnt FROM t_bbs_faq faq WHERE faq.faq_id = #{faqId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_bbs_faq ( faq_id, cl_code, qstn, answ, ord_seq, file_id, use_yn, rgst_id, rgst_dt, modi_id, modi_dt, view_cnt ) VALUES ( #{faqId}, #{clCode}, #{qstn}, #{answ}, #{ordSeq}, #{fileId}, #{useYn}, #{rgstId}, now(), #{modiId}, now(), 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_bbs_faq SET use_yn = 'N' , modi_dt = now() , modi_id = #{modiId} WHERE faq_id = #{faqId}
